title: Buy a license
author: The South Carolina Department
description: The South Carolina Department of Natural Resources website informs citizens about natural resource issues and how they may participate in their protection and use.
cleaned_text: Whether you need to purchase a hunting or fishing license, want to get a refresher on the rules and regulations, or simply want to know where you should go, our agency provides resources to help anyone prepare for their next outdoor adventure. Each edition of South Carolina Wildlife is filled with awe-inspiring vistas, native wildlife species and informative field
